biotools.summary: Database search engine developed to assist the user in the detection and identification of small compounds, such as anabolic androgenic steroids, using the soft ionisation technique Matrix Assisted Laser Desorption/Ionisation (MALDI) coupled with mass spectrometry. It compares the results of the experimental data with theoretic values included in the database. It simplifies the interpretation of the mass spectrometry data and reduces the amount of time required to analyze the results manually.
